metadata.name: Mandalart #1
metadata.description:
Mandalart is the first series of 13 1/1's
in the "SPHIRAL" collection by Kunda.

It's an exploration of the organic growth principles we find everywhere in nature.
The 13 series  will each be created by using 
a different artform or medium.

The Fibonacci sequence is being implemented 
in the art, in the gradual pricing system 
and in the supply.
